tooltip: Select Aydia Dorephan as your hero of choice.

heroSelectionDescriptionElements.tooltipText: Aydia focuses on improving Archer units.
Allows you to summon Aydia, an armored Melee hero.
Archer unit that deals increasingly more damage the longer it attacks a single target.
Total cost of all Archer related Techs are reduced by 10%.
Coral Archers, Silver Archers, and Coralmold Ballista attack range is increased.
